title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19 ยง 171.6 - Faculty
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19 ยง 171.6 - Faculty

State Regulations

An individual who wishes to teach any part of the 25-hour
course shall submit a resume to the Department of State along with evidence
that the applicant meets one of the following qualifications: (a) is an attorney; (b) is a police instructor; (c) is an FBI instructor; (d) has a teacher's certificate from the New

York State Education Department; (e) has five years of full-time experience as
a police officer; (f) has a
four-year college degree majoring in criminal justice; or
(g) has five years, full-time experience as a
licensed private investigator with significant bail enforcement
experience. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19
ยง
171.6

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
